dialogue.text: Hey...'ay man!
You conscious dude?
The hell?
How Did I get outside?
What's Goin on?
You're in MY court now, lil dude!
HUH!?
Sorry about that!
You were in the way of my daily lap around Green Hill.
I tried stopping before I ran into you, but I guess my momentum still carried for a bit.
You good though? You looked pretty out of it.
NAHNAHNAHNAHNAH NAH.
You can't just come around and start acting like this is a common occurance...
YOU'RE SONIC THE FUCKIN' HEDGEHOG!!
Yep, I'm no one special, just a dude who loves to chill and do good.
NO ONE SPECIAL??
You've saved the world on a multitude of occasions, you run faster than the speed of sound,
And don't even get me started on you grabbin' the Chaos Emeralds. SUPER SAIYAN SHIT BRUH!
Not to mention you do all this NAKED! IT'S SO COOL!
Well when you put it like that...I guess I AM someone special, heh.
I've always wanted to be like you, ever since I was younger. My whole fit's based on your image in some ways!
Never thought I'd meet someone as dedicated as you...a bit strange in all honesty.
Say, what's your favorite past time?
Honestly? Rapping.
It's all I've been doing for the past few months. Just bein' on the grind y'know?
Aw yeah! I love rap, I jam out to it constantly! I also do a little bit of free styling when I'm bored.
Yee yee, I've seen you emcee in some commercials before! I wanna see if it was all bluff.
Commercials? That probably wasn't me, I hate public speaking and all that stuff!
If you're tryna rap though, then let's chill and jam out! I've got nothin' but time.
